author: cnbc.com
title: QTM SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Quantum Corporation
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Quantum Corporation (“Quantum” or the “Company”) (NYSE: QTM) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/QTM-Info-Request-Form-1827 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On February 8, 2018, Quantum revealed that it would postpone release of its fiscal third quarter 2018 results and earnings conference call “…so that Quantum’s audit committee…can complete an investigation into accounting matters and related internal controls that were raised in response to a recent inquiry by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).” According to the Company, Quantum received a subpoena from the SEC on January 11, 2018. Following this news, shares of Quantum were down more than 37% on intraday trading on February 8, 2018.
To learn more about the investigation of Quantum contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/QTM-Info-Request-Form-1827 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
